overview: The Desires of Dawn is a film made in the style of the Nudie Cutie films of the 1960's.  Dawn is a shy and sexually repressed young woman who falls asleep one night and awakens in her bed, in the middle of a field in a strange land.  Dawn wanders through her new surroundings and discovers eight beautiful women dancing and stripping before two Queens of her new purgatory. Will she survive her trip into the Exotica?
tagline: Take a trip unto the Exotica with The Desires of Dawn!
title: The Desires Of Dawn
